title: Rebrand app to QUICK-D and update logo to combined logo

requirements.text: Rename the app brand from "Quick-Delvery" to "QUICK-D" across the web frontend, updating all user-facing text (page titles, headings, marketing copy where the brand name appears, and footer copyright) so the brand is consistently shown as "QUICK-D".

quotes: change name as QUICK-D and logo change combain logo

acceptanceCriteria: Auth page displays "Welcome to QUICK-D" (or equivalent) and does not mention "Quick-Delvery".
Home header brand text and footer copyright display "QUICK-D".
Out-of-radius page message uses "QUICK-D" instead of "Quick-Delvery".
A project-wide search in frontend code finds no remaining user-facing occurrences of the old brand name "Quick-Delvery" (excluding historical filenames if any).

requirements.text: Replace the current logo used in the app UI with the new combined QUICK-D logo, updating all places that currently render "/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png" to use the new generated combined logo asset, and ensure alt text uses "QUICK-D".
acceptanceCriteria: Splash, Auth, and Home header logo images render the new combined QUICK-D logo asset (not the old quick-delvery logo).
Logo image alt text is updated to "QUICK-D" where applicable.
No broken image links occur after the logo swap (all updated paths resolve).

requirements.text: Add the new combined QUICK-D logo image file to the frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure it is used directly by the frontend (no backend routing for the image).
acceptanceCriteria: The new logo image exists at frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in the image requirements.
The app loads the logo via a direct static path under /assets/generated/ without any backend calls.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; no backend changes are required for this rebrand unless strictly necessary.
nonGoals: Implementing new authentication methods or changing Internet Identity behavior.
Changing app functionality (catalog, cart, checkout, admin features) beyond updating branding text and logo assets.
Adding push notifications or real-time features.

required: Combined QUICK-D logo mark on transparent background (quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png)
